FuncDef: This command enables BGP to perform a lookup of IGP routes in the route table to resolve the BGP next-hop of label-IPv4 and label-IPv6 routes. This is useful for a Route Reflector (RR) that does not participate in tunnel signaling protocols such as LDP and RSVP and therefore, does not have tunnels to resolve the BGP next-hops of label-unicast routes.
